Verses: 1 nadandha Yaavatraiyum Mordhegaai Arindhapodhu, Mordhegaai Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththu, Rattuduththi, Saambal Pottukkondu, Nagaraththin Naduve Purappattuppoi, Thuyaramulla Magaa Saththaththudane Alarikkondu,
2 raajaavin Aramanai Vaasal Mugappumattum Vandhaan; Rattuduththinavanaai Raajaavin Aramanai Vaasalukkul Pravesikka Oruvanukkum Uththaravillai.

3 raajaavin Uththaravum Avanudaiya Kattalaiyum Poi Serndha Ovvoru Naattilum Sthalaththilumulla Yoodharukkulle Magaa Dhukkamum, Ubavaasamum, Azhugaiyum, Pulambalum Undaai, Anegar Rattuduththi Saambalil Kidandhaargal.

4 appozhudhu Estharin Thaadhimaargalum, Avaludaiya Pradhaanigalumpoi, Adhai Avalukku Ariviththaargal; Adhinaale Raajaaththi Migavum Dhukkappattu, Mordhegaai Uduththirundha Rattai Eduththuppottu, Avanai Uduththuvikkiradharku Vasthirangalai Anuppinaal; Avano Avaigalai Etrukkollaadhirundhaan.

5 appozhudhu Esthar Than Panividaikkendru Raajaavinaal Niyamiththirundha Avanudaiya Pradhaanigalil Oruvanaagiya Aaththaagai Azhaippiththu: Kaariyam Enna? Adhin Mugaandharam Enna? Endru Ariyumpadi, Mordhegaayinidaththil Visaarikka Avanukkuk Kattalaiyittaal.
6 appadiye Aaththaagu Raajaavin Aramanai Vaasalukku Munnaana Pattanaveedhiyilirukkira Mordhegaayinidaththil Purappattupponaan.

7 appozhudhu Mordhegaai Thanakku Sambaviththa Ellaavatraippatriyum, Yoodharai Azhikkumpadi Aamaan Raajaavin Kajaanaavukku Ennikkoduppen Endru Sonna Panaththogaiyaippatriyum Avanukku Ariviththadhum Andri,

8 yoodhargalai Azhikkumpadi Soosaanil Pirandha Kattalaiyin Nagalaiyum Avanidaththil Koduththu, Adhai Estharukkuk Kaanbiththuth Theriyappaduththavum, Aval Agaththiyamaai Raajaavinidaththir Poi, Avanidaththil Than Janangalukkaaga Vinnappampannavum Mandraadavum Vendumendru Avalukku Solla Sonnaan.
9 aaththaagu Vandhu, Mordhegaayin Vaarththaigalai Estharukku Ariviththaan.

11 yaaraavadhu Azhaippikkappadaamal, Ulmutraththil Raajaavinidaththil Pravesiththaal, Purusharaanaalum Sthreeyaanaalum Sari, Avargal Pizhaikkumpadikku Avargalukku Raajaa Porchengolai Neettinaalozhiya Matrappadi Saagavendum Engira Oru Thavaraadha Sattamundu, Idhu Raajaavin Sagala Oozhiyakkaararukkum, Raajaavinudaiya Naadugalilulla Sagala Janangalukkum Theriyum; Naan Indha Muppadhu Naalalavum Raajaavinidaththil Varavazhaippikkappadavillai Endru Sollachchonnaal.
13 mordhegaai Estharukkuth Thirumba Sollachchonnadhu: Nee Raajaavin Aramanaiyilirukkiradhinaal, Matra Yoodhar Thappakkoodaadhirukka, Nee Thappuvaayendru Un Manadhile Ninaivukollaadhe.

14 nee Indhak Kaalaththile Mavunamaayirundhaal, Yoodharukku Sagaayamum Ratchippum Veroru Idaththilirundhu Ezhumbum, Appozhudhu Neeyum Un Thagappan Kudumbaththaarum Azhiveergal; Nee Ippadippatta Kaalaththukku Udhaviyaayirukkumpadi Unakku Raajamenmai Kidaiththirukkalaame, Yaarukkuth Theriyum, Endru Sollachchonnaan.

16 neer Poi, Soosaanil Irukkira Yoodharaiyellaam Koodivarachcheydhu, Moondrunaal Allum Pagalum Pusiyaamalum Kudiyaamalumirundhu, Enakkaaga Ubavaasampannungal; Naanum En Thaadhimaarum Ubavaasampannuvom; Ivvidhamaaga Sattaththai Meeri, Raajaavinidaththil Pravesippen; Naan Seththaalum Saagiren Endru Sollachchonnaal.
17 appozhudhu Mordhegaai Purappattuppoi, Esthar Thanakkuk Karpiththapadiyellaam Seydhaan.
